hero-subtitle: Nurturing minds, inspiring hearts, building character
about-text-1: Founded in 2005, Ananda School Bekasi has established itself as a leading educational institution in the region, combining academic excellence with character development.
about-text-2: Our holistic approach to education ensures that students not only excel academically but also develop strong moral values, creativity, and critical thinking skills.
program-kindergarten-desc: Play-based learning for ages 4-6 focusing on social, emotional, and cognitive development.
program-elementary-desc: Comprehensive curriculum with emphasis on foundational skills and character education.
program-junior-desc: Academic preparation with focus on critical thinking and leadership development.
facility-library-desc: Well-stocked with books, digital resources, and quiet study areas.
facility-lab-desc: Fully equipped labs for physics, chemistry, and biology experiments.
facility-sports-desc: Basketball court, soccer field, and indoor sports facilities.
news-excerpt-1: Our students won three awards at the regional science competition...
news-excerpt-2: Our school has inaugurated a new computer lab with 30 workstations...
news-excerpt-3: Our teachers completed advanced training in modern pedagogy...
contact-subtitle: We'd love to hear from you

footer-about: Providing quality education since 2005 with a focus on academic excellence and character development.
